**Type**

- [UserSettings](#UserSettings)

## Type

### <a id="UserSettings" href="#UserSettings">#</a> UserSettings

A state collection for a user.

##### Properties

| Name        | Type      | Description        |
| ----------- | --------- | ------------------ |
| email       | `string`  | User's email.      |
| isVerified  | `boolean` |                    |
| [thumbnail] | `string`  | A URL to an image. |
